price: Harka isaas [bobaa isaa jalaa] ni baase; Yeroma san isheen warra ilaalaniif adii taate.
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
